howToAddSpeech.question: How do I add a new speech?
howToAddSpeech.answer: Tap the + button on your dashboard, paste your speech text, give it a title, and optionally set a goal date. The AI will automatically break it into learnable segments.

whatIsBeat.question: What is a 'beat'?
whatIsBeat.answer: A beat is a small section of your speech (usually 2-4 sentences) that the app helps you memorize one at a time. Once you master a beat, you'll combine it with others.

howManySpeeches.question: How many speeches can I have?
howManySpeeches.answer: Free users can have 1 active speech per month. Premium users have unlimited speeches.

howPracticeWorks.question: How does practice mode work?
howPracticeWorks.answer: Practice mode shows your speech text with some words visible as cues. Speak your speech aloud - the app tracks your words in real-time and highlights your progress. Words you know well gradually fade out.

whyWordsHidden.question: Why are some words hidden?
whyWordsHidden.answer: The app uses adaptive learning to hide words you've mastered. This challenges your memory and helps you truly memorize rather than just read. Tap hidden words if you need a hint.

micNotWorking.question: My microphone isn't working
micNotWorking.answer: Make sure you've granted microphone permissions in your browser/device settings. Try using Chrome or Safari for best compatibility. If issues persist, try refreshing the page.

whatIsSpacedRepetition.question: What is spaced repetition?
whatIsSpacedRepetition.answer: Spaced repetition is a scientifically-proven learning technique. Instead of cramming, you review material at optimal intervals - just as you're about to forget. This builds stronger, longer-lasting memories.

whyWait.question: Why do I have to wait to practice?
whyWait.answer: Waiting is part of the learning process! Your brain consolidates memories during rest. Practicing too early can actually interfere with this process. Trust the AI scheduling for best results.

canPracticeEarly.question: Can I practice early if I want?
canPracticeEarly.answer: Premium users can bypass the waiting period with the 'Practice Anyway' button. However, for optimal memorization, we recommend following the scheduled times.

whatIsPresentation.question: What is presentation mode?
whatIsPresentation.answer: Presentation mode is a full run-through of your speech without any visible script. It simulates the real experience. After you finish, you get detailed AI feedback on accuracy, missed words, and areas to improve.

whenUsePresentation.question: When should I use presentation mode?
whenUsePresentation.answer: Use it when you feel confident with your speech and want to test yourself. It's great for final preparation before the real thing!

howStreaksWork.question: How do streaks work?
howStreaksWork.answer: Practice at least once per day to maintain your streak. The streak counter shows how many consecutive days you've practiced. It resets if you miss a day.

streakReset.question: What happens if my streak resets?
streakReset.answer: Don't worry! Your progress isn't lost, just the streak counter. Keep practicing and build it back up. Consistency is more important than any single number.

howDeleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
howDeleteAccount.answer: Go to Settings ‚Üí scroll to the bottom ‚Üí tap 'Delete Account'. This permanently removes all your data including speeches, progress, and account information.

changeLanguage.question: How do I change the app language?
changeLanguage.answer: Go to Settings ‚Üí Language ‚Üí select your preferred language. The app supports English, Swedish, Spanish, French, German, Italian, and Portuguese.
